scripts.devst2: echo [2/3] Copy static files... && cpr src/static dist/static -o > null
scripts.devst3: echo [3/3] Copy public files... && cpr src/public dist/public -o > null
scripts.build: npm-run-all buildst1 buildst2 buildst3 buildst4 buildst5 buildst6 buildst7
scripts.buildst2: echo [2/7] Uglify Javascript... && npx uglifyjs-folder dist --pattern "**/*.js" -eo mini -x .js > null
scripts.buildst3: echo [3/7] Uglify MJavascript... && npx uglifyjs-folder dist --pattern "**/*.mjs" -eo mini -x .mjs > null
scripts.buildst4: echo [4/7] Uglify CJavascript... && npx uglifyjs-folder dist --pattern "**/*.cjs" -eo mini -x .cjs > null
scripts.buildst5: echo [5/7] Copy static files... && cpr src/static mini/static -o > null
scripts.buildst6: echo [6/7] Copy public files... && cpr src/public mini/public -o > null
scripts.buildst7: echo [7/7] Remove typescript files in build folder... && del-cli -f mini/**/*.*ts > null
